description.message: Tags display / language icon / Block tags/uploaders and more features

popup_update_str.message: Please press update while you first installed this extension and browse exhentai.

manuel_note.message: Please set your exhentai to Thumbnails View mode

manuel_content.message:
Tag Display

It will run automatically
click the button to switch on/off the tag display

Tag translate

Translate the tags to chinese.

Highlight new gallery

Highlight the gallery that you havn't read before.Please click the update button while first visit after installed this extension.

Block Tags/Uploaders

Block gallerys that contains tags/uploaders you set.

note 1:Please set pure tag
example: Set 'chinese' instead of 'language:chinese'

note 2:Theres a built-in uploader exclude setiing in exhentai

language icon

Note : Exhentai set the gallery without language tag to be japanese.
some western gellery will be with japanese icon

low file size notice

set lower than ?(mb) per page
the program will add a tag on the gallery to notify users.

options_low.message: Low file size warning : lower than <input type='text' id='low_size_size' class='text_input' style='font-size:1.5rem;width:3rem;'> (mb) per page
